author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ramakrishna Math is conducting a six-month Sanskrit course from Wednesday.

Level I will help learners speak in Sanskrit and understand simple and basic slokas, for which classes will be held on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.

In Level II, learners will be taught to read and understand texts like Ramayana and Bhagavad Gita and classes will be held on Tuesdays and Thursdays. The classes will be held from 7.15 p.m. to 8.15 p.m. and certificates will be issued.

For details, visit Ramakrishna Math in Mylapore or contact Ph: 24621110.
title: Sanskrit courses
